scripts.start-zh: DEFAULT_LANG=zh npm run config && ng serve
scripts.start-ru: DEFAULT_LANG=ru npm run config && ng serve
scripts.build:hsbchk:staging: SHOW_CAMPAIGN_LANDING_PAGE=true SHOW_FORGET_PASSWORD_ON_LOGIN=true SHOW_CAMPAIGN_REWARDS_COUNTER_ON_HOMEPAGE=true PREAUTH=true APIHOST=https://api.perxtech.io IS_WHISTLER=false SHOW_USER_QR=true SHOW_ACCOUNTS_PAGE=true SHOW_HOME_PAGE=true SHOW_HISTORY_PAGE=true SHOW_USERINFO_ACCOUNTS=true SHOW_TRANSANCTION_HISTORY_ACCOUNTS=true SHOW_EXPIRY_REWARD_DETAIL=true SHOW_LOGIN_SUBTITLE=true REDIRECT_AFTER_LOGIN=/home SHOW_LOYALTY_BLOCK_ON_HOMEPAGE=false SHOW_NEWSFEED_HOMEPAGE=true SHOW_CATALOG_ON_HOMEPAGE=false SHOW_QUIZ_ON_HOMEPAGE=true SHOW_LUCK_ON_ACCOUNTPAGE=true PRODUCTION=true npm run config && ng build --configuration staging
scripts.build:hsbchk:production: COUNTRY_CODE_PREFIX=852 SHOW_CAMPAIGN_LANDING_PAGE=true SHOW_FORGET_PASSWORD_ON_LOGIN=true SHOW_CAMPAIGN_REWARDS_COUNTER_ON_HOMEPAGE=true PREAUTH=true APIHOST=https://api.perxtech.net IS_WHISTLER=false SHOW_USER_QR=true SHOW_ACCOUNTS_PAGE=true SHOW_HOME_PAGE=true SHOW_HISTORY_PAGE=true SHOW_USERINFO_ACCOUNTS=true SHOW_TRANSANCTION_HISTORY_ACCOUNTS=true SHOW_EXPIRY_REWARD_DETAIL=true SHOW_LOGIN_SUBTITLE=true REDIRECT_AFTER_LOGIN=/home SHOW_LOYALTY_BLOCK_ON_HOMEPAGE=false SHOW_NEWSFEED_HOMEPAGE=true SHOW_CATALOG_ON_HOMEPAGE=false SHOW_QUIZ_ON_HOMEPAGE=true SHOW_LUCK_ON_ACCOUNTPAGE=true PRODUCTION=true npm run config && ng build --prod
scripts.start: COUNTRY_CODE_PREFIX=852 SHOW_CAMPAIGN_LANDING_PAGE=true SHOW_FORGET_PASSWORD_ON_LOGIN=true SHOW_CAMPAIGN_REWARDS_COUNTER_ON_HOMEPAGE=true PREAUTH=false APIHOST=https://api.perxtech.io IS_WHISTLER=false SHOW_USER_QR=true SHOW_ACCOUNTS_PAGE=true SHOW_HOME_PAGE=true SHOW_HISTORY_PAGE=true SHOW_USERINFO_ACCOUNTS=true SHOW_TRANSANCTION_HISTORY_ACCOUNTS=true SHOW_EXPIRY_REWARD_DETAIL=true SHOW_LOGIN_SUBTITLE=true REDIRECT_AFTER_LOGIN=/home SHOW_LOYALTY_BLOCK_ON_HOMEPAGE=false SHOW_NEWSFEED_HOMEPAGE=true SHOW_CATALOG_ON_HOMEPAGE=false SHOW_QUIZ_ON_HOMEPAGE=true SHOW_LUCK_DETAILS_ACCOUNTS=true npm run config && ng serve --host 0.0.0.0
scripts.start:staging: SHOW_CAMPAIGN_LANDING_PAGE=true SHOW_FORGET_PASSWORD_ON_LOGIN=true SHOW_CAMPAIGN_REWARDS_COUNTER_ON_HOMEPAGE=true PREAUTH=false APIHOST=https://api.perxtech.io IS_WHISTLER=false SHOW_USER_QR=true SHOW_ACCOUNTS_PAGE=true SHOW_HOME_PAGE=true SHOW_HISTORY_PAGE=true SHOW_USERINFO_ACCOUNTS=true SHOW_TRANSANCTION_HISTORY_ACCOUNTS=true SHOW_EXPIRY_REWARD_DETAIL=true SHOW_LOGIN_SUBTITLE=true REDIRECT_AFTER_LOGIN=/home SHOW_LOYALTY_BLOCK_ON_HOMEPAGE=false SHOW_NEWSFEED_HOMEPAGE=true SHOW_CATALOG_ON_HOMEPAGE=false SHOW_QUIZ_ON_HOMEPAGE=true SHOW_LUCK_ON_ACCOUNTPAGE=true npm run config && ng serve --host 0.0.0.0 --configuration staging
